bills.title: Require advisory committee for districts that use tax increment financing
Eliminate board of county printing and transfer duties to Dept of Administration
Generally revise property taxes
Revise county clerk and recorder election laws
Revise voter registration laws to include party preference
Revise elected official recall laws
Require excusal of prospective jurors aged 75 and older
Provide for digital advertising tax
Provide that members of the attorneys' examining board are appointed by the governor
Eliminate the board of public assistance
Generally revise laws related to alcohol and minors
Revise DUI laws regarding actual physical control
Generally revise bail bonds and insurance laws
Generally revise professional occupation laws related to private security
Revise the Medicaid expansion program
Generally revise laws related to child safety
Revise municipal zoning to allow for triplex and fourplex housing
Require state buildings to have automatic fire sprinklers or suppression systems
Revise laws on sexual assault
Declare authority over existing fossil-fuel fired electric generating units
Authorize recording of conversation with public official or employee performing an official duty
Revise appraisal process for centrally assessed property
Revise laws related to search warrants
Revising laws related to credit card transaction fees
Provide income tax credit for K-12 education expenses
